item.title: Detecting Credit Card Fraud
item.description: Photo by Bermix Studio on Unsplash This is a project I worked on to investigate some different methods for detecting credit card fraud–a classic unbalanced data problem. Feel free to skip around to different sections or straight to the results. I’ll also include the code so that you can run it and/or follow along. Core Ideas Imbalanced datasets are common when trying to solve many problems â€“ spam email classification, customer churn, insurance fraud detection, or in our case, credit card fraud detection.
